entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:37 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 08:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
